citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
A scientific staff member who is a voting member of the IACUC is also listed on IACUC protocol #ACCURO 2. That
individual participated as a Designated Reviewer (DMR) of the protocol at the IACUC meeting held in June 2024.
However, since this individual is also listed on the protocol they should not have participated in the review or approval
process, as they have a conflict of interest.
Allowing individuals with a conflict of interest to participate in the review and approval process compromises the ability of
the IACUC to ensure optimal animal welfare and the judicious use of animals in study activities. Correct by ensuring that
no member contributes to a quorum nor participates in an IACUC review or approval of an activity in which that member
has a conflicting interest (e.g., is personally involved in the activity), except to provide information requested by the
IACUC
*******Correct by the next IACUC meeting or 9/30/24.

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
IACUC approved Protocol 002 did not contain some of the required information. Specifically, a rationale for using animals
and the appropriateness for the species used was not included.
This information is required in order to ensure that the IACUC is able to properly assess the animal use. The protocol
must be updated to include the required information and subsequently approved by the IACUC.
*********Correct by the next IACUC meeting or by 9/30/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
